knimeNode.name: Credentials Input
knimeNode.shortDescription: Outputs a credentials flow variable with a given value.

intro.p: Outputs a credentials flow variable with a given value. The value can also be controlled from a quick form (web port).

fullDescription.option: A descriptive label that will be shown in, for instance the web portal.
Some lines of description that will be shown in the remote control form, for instance by means of a tooltip.
If the setting should be hidden in the wizard execution.
If the setting should be hidden in the sub node dialog.
Parameter identifier for external parameterization (e.g. batch execution).

option.name: Prompt user name in wrapped metanode dialog/wizard

fullDescription.option: Whether the username should be a separate field in the configuration dialog of a (wrapped) metanode and wizard. If unset the username field will not be shown and the output will always the pre-configured username.

Whether the password should be saved with the workflow. Note that, if saved, the password can be revealed with modest effort by looking at the encryption algorithm used in KNIME's (open) source code. If the password is not saved (option not set) the user will be prompted for the password when the workflow is opened unless the node is already saved executed. In the latter case the password is not prompted assuming downstream consumer nodes, e.g. a DB reader, are also executed and no longer need the credentials. In such cases (resetting and) executing a downstream node will fail as the password is not part of the credentials object passed from this node into the workflow - a re-configuration of this node is required.

option.name: Use KNIME Server Login (when run on server)

fullDescription.option: If the node is executed as part of a job on the KNIME Server Web Portal the password is populated with the user credentials the log-in user.

ports.outPort: Variable output with the given variable defined.
